Planetary Orbital Evolution due to Tides
Orbital evolution of two objects experiencing tides
Public Member Functions | Private Types | Private Attributes | List of all members
Star::EvolvingStellarEnvelope Class Reference

Surface convective zone for low mass evolving stars or the entire star for high mass stars. More...

Detailed Description

Surface convective zone for low mass evolving stars or the entire star for high mass stars.

Definition at line 18 of file EvolvingStellarEnvelope.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

◆ CurrentAgeQuantities

enum Star::EvolvingStellarEnvelope::CurrentAgeQuantities
private

Identifiers for the various age dependent values which are only computed once per fixed age.

All quantities also refer to their derivatives.

Enumerator
RADIUS 

The radius.

INERTIA 

The moment of inertia.
